name: Signup
description: Learn how to create your ues.io account and log in to the studio.

name: Setting Up Your Environment
description: Get your computer ready to for building with ues.io. This lesson will go over downloading and configuring the tools you'll need.

name: Creating Your First App
description: Create apps from the command line. In this lesson we'll use the ues.io CLI to create an app and add functionality with generators.

name: Creating Your First App
description: Use the ues.io studio to create and configure applications. This lesson will guide you through the process of creating new apps and workspaces.
